metadata.title: CVE-2017-13744 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
There is an illegal address access in the function _lou_getALine() incompileTranslationTable.c:343 in Liblouis 3.2.0.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-13744` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblouis-bin - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.1
liblouis-data - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.1
liblouis9 - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.1
python-louis - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.1
python3-louis - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: liblouis package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.6.4-2ubuntu0.1').
